hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.env* ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: .env files should not be edited directly - use environment variables in deployment' && exit 1; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/site" && npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -10 || true; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.test.ts || "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.test.tsx ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/site" && npx vitest run "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | tail -20 || true; fi
